main event: A round object the size of the moon with a fuzzy outline appeared through the windshield of a car in Tussy, Oklahoma on June 25, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for five seconds., The object changed size during the observation., The object was observed moving on a level flight path to the ESE., The report was delayed which hindered investigation., The lack of physical evidence led to the conclusion that it may have been astronomical activity.
sighted object: one round object the size of the moon
